mapper.select: select id as "id", wardNo as "wardNo", departmentNo as "departmentNo", type as "type", state as "state", createTime as "createTime" from ward where 1=1 and if(#{id} is null,0=0,id=#{id}) and if(#{departmentNo} is null,0=0,departmentNo=#{departmentNo}) and if(#{type} is null,0=0,type=#{type}) and if(#{state} is null,0=0,state=#{state})
select id as "id", wardNo as "wardNo", departmentNo as "departmentNo", type as "type", state as "state", createTime as "createTime" from ward where id = #{id}

select d.parameter_id as "parameter_id", f.parameter_values as "parameter_values", f.parameter_name as "parameter_name" from parameter d LEFT JOIN paracode f ON d.`code` = f.`code` WHERE d.`name` = "科室" and if(#{departNo} is null,0=0,f.parameter_values=#{departNo})

select b.departmentNo as "departmentNo", sum(d.nums) as "total" from ward b LEFT JOIN ( select a.wardNo as "wardNo", COUNT(bedNo) as "nums" from ward a left JOIN bed b ON a.wardNo = b.ward LEFT JOIN category c ON a.type = c.type group by a.wardNo) d ON b.wardNo = d.wardNo where 1=1 and if(#{departNo} is null,0=0,b.departmentNo=#{departNo}) GROUP BY b.departmentNo

select b.departmentNo as "departmentNo", sum(d.nums) as "total" from ward b LEFT JOIN ( select a.wardNo as "wardNo", COUNT(bedNo) as "nums" from ward a left JOIN bed b ON a.wardNo = b.ward LEFT JOIN category c ON a.type = c.type where b.state = 0 group by a.wardNo) d ON b.wardNo = d.wardNo GROUP BY b.departmentNo
